description:
Chimimo is a demon with big dreams of unleashing hell on earth! Too bad he`s a freeloading roommate at the Onigami household.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Jigoku no Shimai Battle / Geijutsu ga Bakuhatsu Shite Jigoku Da!
The Hellacious Battle of Siblings / Aw Hell, an Artistic Explosion!
地獄の姉妹バトル / 芸術が爆発して地獄だ!
